title: Heavy showers expected in parts of the country
content: The Department of Meteorology says cloudy skies will prevail over Northern, North-central and Eastern provinces.Showers will occur at times in Northern, North-Central, Eastern and Uva provinces and in Hambantota, Nuwara Eliya and Matale districts. Heavy showers about 100mm can be expected at some places in North-Central and Eastern provinces and Matale district.Showers or thundershowers will occur at several places elsewhere during the evening or night, it said.
